name: Pulley Spidey
description:
Pulley Spidey is mini-game made during a 4 days workshop at the CNAM-ENJMIN.
The exercise was to create an accessible game for mentally disabled adults with an alternative controler.

Scroll  in one way or another to help the spider eat flies.

In the original installation, the mouse was gearing with a rope and a pulley, to make it funnier. We wanted to use a complex system with an arduino to get data direclty from the pulley, but the mouse ended up being the perfect piece.
